verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Maskil of the sons of Korah.) As the deer <S%H354><s%> pants <S%H6165><s%> for the water <S%H4325><s%> brooks, <S%H650><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> pants <S%H6165><s%> for Thee, O God. <S%H430><s%>

My soul <S%H5315><s%> thirsts <S%H6770><s%> for God, <S%H430><s%> for the living <S%H2416><s%> God; <S%H410><s%> When <S%H4970><s%> shall I come <S%H935><s%> and appear <S%H7200><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> God <S%H430><s%>?

My tears <S%H1832><s%> have been <S%H1961><s%> my food <S%H3899><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night, <S%H3915><s%> While [they] say <S%H559><s%> to me all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long, "Where <S%H346><s%> is your God <S%H430><s%>?"

These <S%H428><s%> things <S%H428><s%> I remember, <S%H2142><s%> and I pour <S%H8210><s%> out my soul <S%H5315><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me. For I used to go <S%H5674><s%> along <S%H5674><s%> with the throng <S%H5519><s%> [and] lead <S%H1718><s%> them in procession <S%H1718><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> With the voice <S%H6963><s%> of joy <S%H7440><s%> and thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> a multitude <S%H1995><s%> keeping <S%H2287><s%> festival. <S%H2287><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> are you in despair, <S%H7817><s%> O my soul <S%H5315><s%>? And [why] have you become <S%H1993><s%> disturbed <S%H1993><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me? Hope <S%H3176><s%> in God, <S%H430><s%> for I shall again <S%H5750><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> Him [For] the help <S%H3444><s%> of His presence. <S%H6440><s%>

O my God, <S%H430><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> is in despair <S%H7817><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me; Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> I remember <S%H2142><s%> Thee from the land <S%H776><s%> of the Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> And the peaks of Hermon, <S%H2769><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Mizar. <S%H4706><s%>

Deep <S%H8415><s%> calls <S%H7121><s%> to deep <S%H8415><s%> at the sound <S%H6963><s%> of Thy waterfalls; <S%H6794><s%> All <S%H3605><s%> Thy breakers <S%H4867><s%> and Thy waves <S%H1530><s%> have rolled <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> me.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> His lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> in the daytime; <S%H3119><s%> And His song <S%H7892><s%> will be with me in the night, <S%H3915><s%> A prayer <S%H8605><s%> to the God <S%H410><s%> of my life. <S%H9132><s%>

I will say <S%H559><s%> to God <S%H410><s%> my rock, <S%H5553><s%> "Why <S%H4100><s%> hast Thou forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me? Why <S%H4100><s%> do I go <S%H1980><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%> because of the oppression <S%H3906><s%> of the enemy <S%H340><s%>?"

As a shattering <S%H7524><s%> of my bones, <S%H6106><s%> my adversaries <S%H6887><s%> revile <S%H2778><s%> me, While they say <S%H559><s%> to me all <S%H3605><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> long, "Where <S%H346><s%> is your God <S%H430><s%>?"

Why <S%H4100><s%> are you in despair, <S%H7817><s%> O my soul <S%H5315><s%>? And why <S%H4100><s%> have you become <S%H1993><s%> disturbed <S%H1993><s%> within <S%H5921><s%> me? Hope <S%H3176><s%> in God, <S%H430><s%> for I shall yet <S%H5750><s%> praise <S%H3034><s%> Him, The help <S%H3444><s%> of my countenance, <S%H6440><s%> and my God. <S%H430><s%>
